title: Amon Tobin techno typography
content:
I was wondering if anyone knows who designs the type/art for electronic musician Tobin Amon   
 ![amon](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415041835im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/70352.jpg)
author: designalchemy

comments.content:
possibly [Hi-Res](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415041835/http:/www.hi-res.net/)... they did his old website.   
They say the site is in their archive, [but it doesn't appear to be](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415041835/http:/www.google.com/search?hl=en&lr=&client=firefox-a&rls=org.mozilla%3Aen-US%3Aofficial&q=site%3Aarchive.hi-res.net+amon&btnG=Search)...

[DustBust](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415041835/http:/www.dafont.com/en/author.php?author=33) does similar stuff but simpler of course. Check out   
his Kryptic for example
